about_the_game:
This is a New Year's fairy tale and at the same time a small spin-off of the first part of the game Zeliria Sactuary.
On Earth it is already New Year's Eve, and Maxx, who became the ruler of Umari, can only dream of this holiday. No one around knows what winter, snow and Christmas tree are. However, when you strongly want something (especially on New Year), your wish can come true! And suddenly it turns out that not only Maxx, but also Humkey misses the winter holiday, which was celebrated on Salangan as one of the main ones! So, the fun begins!
And who knows, maybe on this night Leeka and Eyka's dreams are also destined to come true...

About the game:
- 20-25 minutes of gameplay
- As many as 2 (!!!) happy New Year's endings!
- Not a single chance for a bad end! Although...
- Leeka's new outfit!
- Humkey as Santa Claus!
detailed_description:
This is a New Year's fairy tale and at the same time a small spin-off of the first part of the game Zeliria Sactuary.
On Earth it is already New Year's Eve, and Maxx, who became the ruler of Umari, can only dream of this holiday. No one around knows what winter, snow and Christmas tree are. However, when you strongly want something (especially on New Year), your wish can come true! And suddenly it turns out that not only Maxx, but also Humkey misses the winter holiday, which was celebrated on Salangan as one of the main ones! So, the fun begins!
And who knows, maybe on this night Leeka and Eyka's dreams are also destined to come true...

About the game:
- 20-25 minutes of gameplay
- As many as 2 (!!!) happy New Year's endings!
- Not a single chance for a bad end! Although...
- Leeka's new outfit!
- Humkey as Santa Claus!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: Pentium 4
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL compatible
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL compatible
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

name: Happy New Year, Zeliria!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel atom Z3xx (Silvermont)
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Series. 1280x720 or better required
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Devices compartible Direct Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit ver)
  • Processor: Core i5 of Ivy Bridge generation or better or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 2096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or Nvidia (VRAM 1GB or better). Recommended 1920x1080
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Devices compartible Direct Sound

short_description: This is a New Year's fairy tale and at the same time a small spin-off of the first part of the game Zeliria Sactuary.
